Header: Bollywood beauty expresses desire to marry Salman Khan
Content: Trisha Krishnan, who made her Bollywood debut with Priyadarshan’s Khatta Meetha opposite Akshay Kumar, has expressed her desire to marry Salman Khan. The southern beauty confessed this on popular television show Koffee with DD when she was asked whom would she propose marriage. Popular southern actress Trisha Krishnan’s film Endrendrum Punnagai with Jiiva in the lead, hit the screen last week. The talented actress, who has been in the industry for more than a decade now, also revealed, that she has been a huge fan of Salman Khan since her childhood days. Endrendrum Punnagai has been receiving lot of critical acclaim and the word of mouth is fast spreading and the glowing reviews are drawing audience in big numbers. The film starring Jiiva and Trisha in the lead also has Santhanam, Vinay Rai and Andrea in important roles. Times of India
